meanings.definition: A dark red color resembling that of oxblood.
meanings.sent1: The artist used oxblood paint to create a beautiful sunset in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The front door of the house was painted in a rich oxblood color.
meanings.sent3: The oxblood curtains made the room feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned oxblood with embarrassment when she realized her mistake.
meanings.sent5: The oxblood hue of the sky at dusk was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of leather dyed a dark red color.
meanings.sent1: She admired the oxblood handbag in the store window.
meanings.sent2: The vintage armchair was upholstered in luxurious oxblood leather.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly referred to his oxblood shoes as his lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The oxblood leather jacket added a touch of sophistication to his outfit.
meanings.sent5: The oxblood leather had a smooth texture and rich color.

meanings.sent1: The guests enjoyed a glass of oxblood with their dinner.
meanings.sent2: She savored the taste of the oxblood as it lingered on her palate.
meanings.sent3: The oxblood paired perfectly with the savory steak dish.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the oxblood filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.
meanings.sent5: The oxblood had a velvety smoothness that pleased even the most discerning wine connoisseur.
